column1: The Purple Pig////My favorite dish was the turkey leg... The meat fell right off the bone! It would have paired very well with the roasted beets
column2: however we gobbled those up as soon as they came out! I also loved the half duck! It was superb and substantial. Of all of our plates
column5: and the beets were the most substantial size-wise. The spare rib was tasty
column6: but a bit tart. The lobster cannoli dish was very good
column7: but the issue was it was too small of a portion. We decided to share a bottle of wine at the table
column8: because the price of individual glasses were quite high.
